(1996), Grosse Pointe Blank (1997), Lock, Stock, and Two Smoking Barrels (1998), and Go (1999). In Jason Statham: Early life

…the con man Bacon in Lock, Stock, and Two Smoking Barrels. The crime comedy, which was director Guy Ritchie’s first feature film, earned widespread praise. It also marked the start of a productive—and lucrative—director-actor friendship. Statham was later cast in Ritchie’s second film, Snatch (2000), which also featured Brad Pitt.…
